title: So Angry I'm Seeing Red
itunes:title: So Angry I'm Seeing Red
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I begin this letter by saying I hate my husband of 12 years. I feel as though he has made a fool of me and I feel stupid. The thought of him makes me sick to my stomach. I want to say kiss my butt. I'm at the point in which I don't even care to confront him for what reason.....

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I begin this letter by saying I hate my husband of 12 years. I feel as though he has made a fool of me and I feel stupid. The thought of him makes me sick to my stomach. I want to say kiss my butt. I'm at the point in which I don't even care to confront him for what reason.....
